info.abstract:
[Type] Metadata access.
[Behaviour] Set a parameter in the workflow environment.
[Parameters] - name : name of the parameter. It should comply with IEEE Std 1003.1-2001 conventions, unless brackets {} are adopted to refer it. - value : value of the parameter. By default it will se to "1". It can be accessed with @name or @{name}.
[Examples] Set the parameter "var" to "10": OPH_TERM: oph_set name=var;value=10; SUBMISSION STRING: "operator=oph_set;name=var;value=10;"
